headline: Energy Transition Today - Genie Energy Navigates Challenges In Renewable Energy Growth
summary: Genie Energy Ltd. reported mixed results for the second quarter of 2025, reflecting the complexities of the current energy transition landscape. Despite achieving double-digit revenue growth, the company experienced margin compression due to increased wholesale power prices and higher consumption driven by unseasonably hot weather. Growth in renewable initiatives was highlighted by ongoing solar projects, although certain developments were paused following federal policy changes affecting...
